src:
Sedang di Jepang, Megawati Belum Pasti Hadir di Kongres NasDem
07 Nov 2019, 04:27 by Budiarti Utami Putri, Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Sekretaris Jenderal Partai Demokrasi Indonesia Perjuangan Hasto Kristiyanto mengaku sudah menyampaikan undangan Kongres Partai NasDem kepada ketua umumnya, Megawati Soekarnoputri. Namun Hasto belum memastikan Mega akan hadir lantaran saat ini tengah berada di Jepang.
"Undangannya sudah kami sampaikan kepada Ibu Megawati Soekarnoputri. Saat ini beliau sedang berada di Jepang," kata Hasto ditemui seusai HUT Partai Golkar ke-55 di The Sultan Hotel, Jakarta, Rabu malam, 6 November 2019.
Hasto mengatakan Megawati sedang berada di Negeri Sakura itu untuk kegiatan pribadi. Dia belum merinci kapan Mega akan kembali. Menurut Hasto, Presiden RI ke-5 itu mungkin hadir Kongres Nasdem jika memang sudah kembali ke Tanah Air.
"Nanti kalau beliau hadir (pulang) lebih awal ya tentu biasanya Ibu hadir, tapi beliau masih di Jepang," ujarnya.
Kongres NasDem akan digelar pada 8-11 November 2019 ini di Jiexpo Kemayoran, Jakarta Pusat. Sejumlah tokoh akan diundang menghadiri acara tersebut, mulai dari para ketua umum partai politik hingga Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan.
DPP Partai NasDem Taufik Basari mengatakan, kongres itu sekaligus akan kembali mengukuhkan Surya Paloh menjadi ketua umum. "Kalau dari pandangan-pandangan yang sekarang beredar di berbagai wilayah, provinsi, termasuk dari DPP, ya sepertinya kami masih membutuhkan sosok Surya Paloh untuk memimpin Partai NasDem ini," kata Taufik kepada wartawan, Selasa, 5 November 2019.
text:
While in Japan, Megawati is definitely not present at the NasDem Congress
Nov 7 2019, 04:27 by Budiarti Utami Putri, Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Secretary General of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle Hasto Kristiyanto claimed to have submitted an invitation to the NasDem Party Congress to its general chairman, Megawati Soekarnoputri. However, Hasto has not confirmed that Mega will be present because he is currently in Japan.
"We have conveyed the invitation to Ms. Megawati Soekarnoputri. She is currently in Japan," Hasto said after the 55th Golkar Party anniversary at The Sultan Hotel, Jakarta, Wednesday night, November 6, 2019.
Hasto said Megawati was in Sakura for private activities. He has not specified when Mega will return. According to Hasto, the 5th President of the Republic of Indonesia might have attended the Nasdem Congress if he had returned to the country.
"Later, if he attended (returned) early, of course, usually you will attend, but he is still in Japan," he said.
The NasDem Congress will be held on 8-11 November 2019 at Jiexpo Kemayoran, Central Jakarta. A number of figures will be invited to attend the event, ranging from general political party chairpersons to DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan.
DPD NasDem Party Taufik Basari said the congress would once again confirm Surya Paloh as chairman. "If from the current views circulating in various regions, provinces, including from the DPP, it seems we still need the figure of Surya Paloh to lead the NasDem Party," Taufik told reporters on Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
